id='poem_sentence_1_140482'>归念乐天诗。人生足别离。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140482_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140482'>云屏深夜语。梦到君知否。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140482'>玉箸莫偷垂。断肠天不知。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140482'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_140482_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1174&endYear=1174')">1174年8月15日</a>　建康中秋夜为吕叔潜赋词。作品：《太常引》（一轮秋影转金波）<div id='poem_140106' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140106' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140106?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太常引 建康中秋夜，为吕叔潜赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1174年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a id='poem_sentence_1_140106'>把酒问姮娥：被白发、欺人奈何！<div id='poem_sentence_1_140106_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140106'>乘风好去，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_140106", 140106, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>长空</span>万里，直下看山河。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140106_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1174&endYear=1174')">1174年</a>　登建康赏心亭赋词。作品：《水龙吟》（楚天千里清秋）<div id='poem_140115' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140115' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140115?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水龙吟<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>登建康赏心亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1174年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140115")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140115_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140115'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140115'>楚天千里清秋，水随天去秋无际。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140115'>遥岑远目，献愁供恨，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_140115", 140115, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>玉簪</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_140115", 140115, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>螺髻</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140115'>把吴钩看了，栏干拍遍，无人会，登临意。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140115_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140115'>休说鲈鱼堪脍，尽西风，季鹰归未？<div id='poem_sentence_4_140115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140115'>求田问舍，怕应羞见，刘郎才气。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_140115", 140115, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>翠袖</span>，揾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>英雄泪！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_140115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_140115'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_140115_0'>⑴ 音吻（wen3），擦拭的意思。</div></div></div><div /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1174&endYear=1174')">1174年10月3日</a>　作词寿建康帅胡长文给事。时方阅《折红梅》之舞，且有锡带之宠。作品：《八声甘州》（把江山好处付公来）<div id='poem_140064' class='_poem'><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140064_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140064'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140064'>把江山好处付公来，金陵帝王州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140064'>想今年燕子，依然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_140064", 140064, id='poem_sentence_4_140064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140064'>有红梅新唱，香阵卷温柔。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140064_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
杭州（临安）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4e24f7f0036f439ca1664f962be97198_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4e24f7f0036f439ca1664f962be97198");'><span id='4e24f7f0036f439ca1664f962be97198_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1170&endYear=1171')">1170-1171年</a>，31-32岁</div><div id='4e24f7f0036f439ca1664f962be97198' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1170&endYear=1170')">1170年</a>　召对延和殿，论奏“阻江为险，须藉两淮”作品：论阻江为险须藉两淮。<div id='poem_1282046' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1282046' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1282046?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论阻江为险须藉两淮疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1170年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_1282046")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1282046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1282046'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1282046'>臣窃惟自中兴以来，驻跸临安，阻江为险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1282046_comment'></div>然江之为险，须藉两淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1282046_comment'></div>自古南北分离之际，盖未有无淮而能保江者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1282046_comment'></div>然则两淮形势，在今日岂不重哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1282046_comment'></div>臣仰惟陛下垂意边防，规恢远略，沈几先物，虑无遗策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1282046_comment'></div>然臣偶有管见，虑之甚熟，诚恐有补万一，惟陛下宽听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1282046_comment'></div>盖两淮绵地千里，势如张弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1282046_comment'></div>若虏骑南来，东趋扬、楚，西走和、庐，苟吾兵无以断隔其中，则彼东西往来，其路径直，如走弦上，荡然无虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1282046_comment'></div>若吾兵断隔其中，则彼淮东之兵不能救淮西，而淮西之兵亦不能应淮东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1282046_comment'></div>设使势穷力蹙之际，复由淮北而来，则走弓之背，其路迂远，悬隔千里，势不相及，入吾重地，兵分为二，其败可立而待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1282046_comment'></div>古之为兵者，谓其势如常山之蛇，击其首则尾应，击其尾则首应，击其身则首尾俱应，然后其兵立于不败之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1282046_comment'></div>今以两淮地形言之，则淮东为首，而淮西为尾，淮之中则其身也，断其身则首尾不能救，明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1282046_comment'></div>三国之时，吴人以瓦梁堰为身，筑垒而守之，而魏终不能胜吴者，吴保其身，而魏徒能击淮西之地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1282046_comment'></div>五代之时，南唐虑周师之来，盖尝求吴人故迹而守之，功未成而周兵至，然犹遣皇甫晖、姚凤以精兵十五万扼定远县，负清流关而守，世宗亦以艺祖皇帝神武之兵当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1282046_comment'></div>虏骑之来也，常先以精骑由濠梁破滁州，然后淮东之兵方敢入寇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1282046_comment'></div>其去也，惟滁之兵为最后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1282046_comment'></div>由此观之，自古及今，南兵之守淮，北兵之攻淮，未尝不先以精兵断其中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1282046_comment'></div>况今虏人之势，一犯吾境，其所以忌我者非战也，忌吾有兵以出其后耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1282046_comment'></div>一出其后，则淮北之民必乱，而淮北之城亦可乘间而取，如向之海、泗、唐、邓是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1282046_comment'></div>今陛下城楚城扬于东，城庐城和于西，金汤屹然，所以为守者具矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1282046_comment'></div>然臣以谓，两淮之中，犹未有积甲储粟，形格势禁，可以截然分断虏人首尾之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1282046_comment'></div>以臣愚见：当取淮之地而三分之，建为三大镇，择沈鸷有谋、文武兼具之人，假以岁月，宽其绳墨以守之，而居中者得节制东西二镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1282046_comment'></div>缓急之际，虏攻淮东，中镇救之，而西镇出兵淮北，临陈、蔡以挠之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1282046_comment'></div>虏攻淮西，中镇救之，而东镇出兵淮北，临海、泗以挠之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1282046_comment'></div>虏攻中镇，则建康悉兵以救之，而东西镇俱出兵淮北以挠之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1282046_comment'></div>东西镇俱受兵，则彼兵分力寡，中镇悉兵淮北，临宿、亳以挠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1282046_comment'></div>此苏秦教六国之所以为守，而秦人闻之所以不敢出兵于函谷关也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1282046_comment'></div>比之纷纷纭纭，自战其地者，利害不侔矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1282046_comment'></div>如臣言可采，乞下两府大臣并知兵将帅，详议建立三镇去处，措置施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1282046_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1170&endYear=1170')">1170年</a>　又上疏请练民兵以守淮。作品：议练民兵守淮。<div id='poem_1282047' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1282047' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1282047?labeling=true' target='_blank'>议练民兵守淮疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1170年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_1282047")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1282047_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1282047'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1282047'>臣闻事不前定不可以应猝，兵不预谋不可以制胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1282047_comment'></div>臣谓两淮裂为三镇，形格势禁，足以待敌矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1282047_comment'></div>然守城必以兵，养兵必以民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1282047_comment'></div>使万人为兵，立于城上，闭门拒守，财用之所资给，衣食之所办具，其下非有万家不能供也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1282047_comment'></div>往时虏人南寇，两淮之民常望风奔走，流离道路，无所归宿，饥寒困苦，不兵而死者十之四五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1282047_comment'></div>臣以谓两淮民虽稀少，分则不足，聚则有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1282047_comment'></div>若使每州为城，每城为守，则民分势寡，力有不给；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1282047_comment'></div>苟敛而聚之于三镇，则其民将不胜其多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1282047_comment'></div>窃计两淮户口不减二十万，聚之使来，法当半至，犹不减十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1282047_comment'></div>以十万户之民供十万之兵，全力以守三镇，虏虽善攻，自非扫境而来，乌能以岁月拔三镇哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1282047_comment'></div>况三镇之势，左提右挈，横连纵出，且战且守，以制其后，臣以谓虽有兀术之智，逆亮之力，亦将无如之何，况其下者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1282047_comment'></div>故臣愿陛下分淮南为三镇，预分郡县户口以隶之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1282047_comment'></div>无事之时，使各居其土，营治生业，无异平日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1282047_comment'></div>缓急之际，令三镇之将各檄所部州县，管拘本土民兵户口，赴本镇保守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1282047_comment'></div>老弱妻子，牛畜资粮，聚之城内；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1282047_comment'></div>其丁壮则授以器甲，令于本镇附近险要去处，分据寨栅，与虏骑互相出没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1282047_comment'></div>彼进吾退，彼退吾进，不与之战，务在夺其心而耗其气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1282047_comment'></div>而大兵堂堂整整，全力以伺其后，有馀则战，不足则守，虏虽劲亦不能为吾患矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1282047_comment'></div>且使两淮之民，仓卒之际，不致流离奔窜，徒转徙沟壑就毙而已也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1282047_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: -----title
赣州
-----detail

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>　向朝廷进劄子。作品：《启劄》（弃疾自秋初去国）<div id='poem_1282065' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1282065' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a 江陵
-----detail

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　严格治盗，“得贼辄杀，不复穷究”，遂使奸盗屏迹。<br /><a href="javascript: 南昌（豫章）

id='poem_sentence_3_140480'>不似远山横。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_140480", 140480, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>秋波</span>相共明。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　为吕祖谦撰祭文。作品：祭吕东莱先生文。<div id='poem_1282068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1282068' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1282068?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭吕东莱先生文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_1282068")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1282068_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1282068'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1282068'>维淳熙八年岁次辛丑，十一月癸酉朔，初二日甲戌，奉议郎、充右文殿修撰、知隆兴军府事兼管内劝农营田事、主管江南西路安抚司公事、马步军都总管辛弃疾，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于近故宫使直阁大著吕公之灵：某官天质之美，道学之粹，操存之既固，而充养之又至，一私欲未始萌于心，极万变不足以移其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1282068_comment'></div>故不力而勇，甚和而毅，泯爱憎以无迹，更毁誉而一致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1282068_comment'></div>宜君上益信其贤，而同异者莫得窥其际也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1282068_comment'></div>任重道远，发轫早岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1282068_comment'></div>遗外形体，辍寝忘味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1282068_comment'></div>事物之来，若未始经吾意，迨夫审是决疑，则精微正大，中在物之理，而尽处物之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1282068_comment'></div>私淑诸人，固已设科不拒，闻者心醉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1282068_comment'></div>道行志得，抑将使群才并用而众志咸遂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1282068_comment'></div>乃若生长见闻，人物门第，高文大册，博览强记，虽皆过绝于人，要之盖其馀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1282068_comment'></div>厥今上承伊、洛，远溯洙、泗，佥曰「朱、张、东莱」，屹鼎立于一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1282068_comment'></div>学者有宗，圣传不坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1282068_comment'></div>又皆齿壮而力强，夫何南轩亡而公病废！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1282068_comment'></div>上方付公以斯文，谓究用其犹未。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1282068_comment'></div>传闻有瘳，士夫增气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1282068_comment'></div>忽反袂而相吊，惊邮传于殄瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1282068_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1282068_comment'></div>寿考之不究，德业之未试，室无人而子幼，何福善而如是！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1282068_comment'></div>然而天所畀与者其得抑多矣，又奚有于乔松之年、赵孟之贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1282068_comment'></div>弃疾半世倾风，同朝托契，尝从游于南轩，盖于公而敬畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1282068_comment'></div>兹物论之共悼，宁有怀于私惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1282068_comment'></div>缄忱辞于千里，寓哀情于一酹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1282068_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1282068_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年11月</a>　冬十一月，改除两浙西路提点刑狱公事，旋以台臣王蔺论列，落职罢新任。<br /></div>
-----end

扬州

id='poem_sentence_0_140541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140541'>人道是、匆匆五月，渡泸深入。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140541_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140541'>三万卷，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_140541", 140541, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>龙头客</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140541'>浑未得，文章力。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140541'>把诗书马上，笑驱锋镝。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140541'>金印明年如斗大，貂蝉却自兜鍪出。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140541'>待刻公、勋业到云霄，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_140541", 140541, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>浯溪石</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140541_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140541'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_140541_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1179&endYear=1179')">1179年</a>　改知潭州，兼湖南安抚使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1179&endYear=1179')">1179年</a>　奏进“论盗贼札子”<div id='poem_1282059' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1282059' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1282059?labeling=true' target='_blank'>淳熙己亥论盗贼劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1179年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_1282059")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1282059_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1282059'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1282059'>臣窃惟方今朝廷清明，法令备具，虽四方万里之远，涵泳德泽如在畿甸，宜乎盗贼不作，兵寝刑措，少副陛下厉精求治之意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1282059_comment'></div>而比年以来，李金之变，赖文正之变，姚明敖之变，陈峒之变，及今李接、陈子明之变，皆能攘臂一呼，聚众千百，杀掠吏民，死且不顾，重烦大兵剪灭而后已，是岂理所当然者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1282059_comment'></div>臣窃伏思念，以为实臣等辈分阃持节，居官亡状，不能奉行三尺，斥去贪浊，宣布德意，牧养小民，孤负陛下使令之所致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1282059_comment'></div>责之臣辈，不敢逃罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1282059_comment'></div>臣闻唐太宗与群臣论盗，或请重法以禁，太宗哂之曰：「民之所以为盗者，由赋繁役重，官吏贪求，饥寒切身，故不暇顾廉耻尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1282059_comment'></div>当轻徭薄赋，选用廉吏，使民衣食有馀，则自不为盗，安用重法耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1282059_comment'></div>大哉斯言！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1282059_comment'></div>其后海内升平，路不拾遗，外户不闭，卒致贞观之治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1282059_comment'></div>以是言之，罪在臣辈，将何所逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1282059_comment'></div>臣姑以湖南一路言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1282059_comment'></div>自臣到任之初，见百姓遮道，自言嗷嗷困苦之状，臣以谓斯民无所愬，不去为盗，将安之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1282059_comment'></div>臣一一按奏，所谓「诛之则不可胜诛」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1282059_comment'></div>臣试为陛下言其略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1282059_comment'></div>陛下不许多取百姓斗面米，今有一岁所取反数倍于前者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1282059_comment'></div>陛下不许将百姓租米折纳见钱，今有一石折纳至三倍者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1282059_comment'></div>并耗言之，横歛可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1282059_comment'></div>陛下不许科罚人户钱贯，今则有旬日之间追二三千户而科罚者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1282059_comment'></div>又有已纳足租税而复科纳者，有已纳足、复纳足、又诬以违限而科罚者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1282059_comment'></div>有违法科卖醋钱、写状纸、由子、户帖之属，其钱不可胜计者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1282059_comment'></div>军兴之际，又有非军行处所，公然分上中下户而科钱，每都保至数百千；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1282059_comment'></div>有以贱价抑买、贵价抑卖百姓之物，使之破荡家业、自缢而死者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1282059_comment'></div>有二三月间便催夏税钱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1282059_comment'></div>其他暴征苛歛，不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1282059_comment'></div>然此特官府聚歛之弊尔，流弊之极，又有甚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1282059_comment'></div>州以趣办财赋为急，县有残民害物之政而州不敢问；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1282059_comment'></div>县以并缘科歛为急，吏有残民害物之状而县不敢问；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1282059_comment'></div>吏以取乞货赂为急，豪民大姓有残民害物之罪而吏不敢问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1282059_comment'></div>故田野之民，郡以聚歛害之，县以科率害之，吏以取乞害之，豪民大姓以兼并害之，而又盗贼以剽杀攘夺害之，臣以谓「不去为盗，将安之乎」，正谓是耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1282059_comment'></div>且近年以来，年谷屡丰，粒米狼戾，而盗贼不禁乃如此，一有水旱乘之，臣知其弊有不可胜言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1282059_comment'></div>民者国之根本，而贪浊之吏迫使为盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1282059_comment'></div>今年剿除，明年扫荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1282059_comment'></div>譬如木焉，日刻月削，不损则折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1282059_comment'></div>臣不胜忧国之心，实有私忧过计者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1282059_comment'></div>欲望陛下深思致盗之由，讲求弭盗之术，无恃其有平盗之兵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1282059_comment'></div>臣孤危一身久矣，荷陛下保全，事有可为，杀身不顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1282059_comment'></div>况陛下付臣以按察之权，责臣以澄清之任，封部之内，吏有贪浊，职所当问，其敢瘝旷，以负恩遇！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1282059_comment'></div>自今贪浊之吏，臣当不畏强御，次第按奏，以俟明宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1282059_comment'></div>庶几荒遐远徼，民得更生，盗贼衰息，以助成朝廷胜残去杀之治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1282059_comment'></div>但臣生平刚拙自信，年来不为众人所容，顾恐言未脱口而祸不旋踵，使他日任陛下远方耳目之寄者，以臣为戒，不敢按吏，以养成盗贼之祸，为可虑耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1282059_comment'></div>伏望朝廷先以臣今所奏，申敕本路州县：自今以始，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1282059", 1282059, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>洗心革面</span>，皆以惠养元元为意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1282059_comment'></div>有违弃法度、贪冒亡厌者，使诸司各扬其职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1282059_comment'></div>无徒取小吏按举，以应故事，且自为文过之地而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1282059_comment'></div>臣不胜幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1282059_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1179&endYear=1179')">1179年</a>　奉孝宗手诏，谕惩治盗贼旨意。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年2月4日</a>　春，奏请以官米募工，浚筑陂塘，因而赈给。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年2月</a>　出桩积米赈粜永、邵、郴三州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　春，整顿湖南乡社。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　席上作词送张仲固帅兴元。作品：《木兰花慢》（汉中开汉业）<div id='poem_140112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140112' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_0_140112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140112'>想剑指三秦，君王得意，一战东归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>长沙道中，壁上有妇人题字，输与寻常姊妹家。因此作词。作品：《减字木兰花》（盈盈泪眼）<div id='poem_140439' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140439' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140439?labeling=true' target='_blank'>减字木兰花 纪壁间题</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_140530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140530'>便过眼、等闲输了，三分之一。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140530'>昼永暖翻红杏雨，风晴扶起垂杨力。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140530'>更天涯、芳草最关情，烘残日。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140530'>便恁归来能几许，风流已自非畴昔。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140530'>凭画栏、一线数飞鸿，沈空碧。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140530'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_140530_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赋《满江红》词。作品：《满江红》（敲碎离愁）《满江红》（倦客新丰）《满江红》（风卷庭梧）<div id='poem_140549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140549?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140549")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140549_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140549'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140549'>敲碎离愁，纱窗外，风摇翠竹，人去后，吹箫声断，倚楼人独，满眼不堪三月暮，举头已觉千山绿，但试把一纸寄来书，从头读。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140549_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140549'>相思字，空盈幅，相思意，何时足，滴罗襟点点，泪珠盈掬，芳草不迷行客路，垂杨只碍离人目，最苦是，立尽月黄昏，栏干曲。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_140549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_140549'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(140549)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_140543' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140543' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140543?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>婺女潘子贱席上作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140543_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140543'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140543'>倦客新丰，貂裘敝、征尘满目。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140543'>弹短铗、青蛇三尺，浩歌谁续。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140543'>不念英雄江左老，用之可以尊中国。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140543'>叹诗书、万卷致君人，番沉陆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140543_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140543'>休感叹，年华促。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140543'>人易老，欢难足。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140543'>有玉人怜我，为簪黄菊。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140543'>且置请缨封万户，竟须卖剑酬黄犊。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140543'>叹当年、寂寞贾长沙，伤时哭。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140543'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_140543_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_140526' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140526' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140526?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_140526'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140526'>风卷庭梧，黄叶坠、新凉如洗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140526'>一笑折、秋英同赏，弄香挼蕊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140526'>天远难穷休久望，楼高欲下还重倚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140526'>拼一襟、寂寞泪弹秋，无人会。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140526_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140526'>今古恨，沈荒垒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140526'>悲欢事，随流水。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140526'>想登楼青鬓，未堪憔悴。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140526'>极目烟横山数点，孤舟月淡人千里。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140526'>对婵娟、从此话离愁，金尊里。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140526'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_140526_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赋词送人归临安。作品：《贺新郎》（柳暗清波路）<div id='poem_140391' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140391' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140391?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺新郎<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140391")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140391_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140391'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140391'>柳暗清波路。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140391'>送春归、猛风暴雨，一番新绿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140391'>千里潇湘葡萄涨，人解扁舟欲去。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140391'>又樯燕、留人相语。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140391'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_140391", 140391, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>艇子</span>飞来生尘步，唾花寒、唱我新番句。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140391'>波似箭，催鸣橹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140391_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140391'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_140391", 140391, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>黄陵祠</span>下山无数。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140391'>听湘娥、泠泠曲罢，为谁情苦。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140391'>行到东吴春已暮，正江阔、潮平稳渡。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140391'>望金雀、觚棱翔舞。<div id='poem_sentence_9_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_140391'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_140391", 140391, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>前度刘郎</span>今重到，问玄都、千树花存否。<div id='poem_sentence_10_140391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_140391'>愁为倩，么弦诉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_140391_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>夏，奏请于郴州宜章县、桂阳军临武县并置学。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>奏劾知桂阳军赵善珏，罢之。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>创置湖南飞虎军。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>变税酒法为榷酒法。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>秋，覆阅解试卷，得赵方。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>经始构建上饶居第，作文记之。至晚于本年自称“稼轩居士”作品：新居上梁文。<div id='poem_1282071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1282071' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1282071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新居上梁文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_1282071")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1282071_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1282071'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1282071'>「百万买宅，千万买邻」，人生孰若安居之乐？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1282071_comment'></div>一年种谷，十年种木，君子常有静退之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1282071_comment'></div>久矣倦游，兹焉卜筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1282071_comment'></div>稼轩居士生长西北，仕宦东南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1282071_comment'></div>顷列郎星，继联卿月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1282071_comment'></div>两分帅阃，三驾使轺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1282071_comment'></div>不特风霜之手欲龟，亦恐名利之发将鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1282071_comment'></div>欲得置锥之地，遂营环堵之宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1282071_comment'></div>虽在城邑阛阓之中，独出车马嚣尘之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1282071_comment'></div>青山屋上，古木千章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1282071_comment'></div>白水田头，新荷十顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1282071_comment'></div>亦将东阡西陌，混渔樵以交欢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1282071_comment'></div>稚子佳人，共团栾而一笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1282071_comment'></div>梦寐少年之鞍马，沉酣古人之诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1282071_comment'></div>虽云富贵逼人，自觉林泉邀我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1282071_comment'></div>望物外逍遥之趣，「吾亦爱吾庐」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1282071_comment'></div>语人间奔竞之流，「卿自用卿法」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1282071_comment'></div>始扶修栋，庸庆抛梁：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1282071'>抛梁东，坐看朝暾万丈红。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1282071_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1282071", 1282071, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>直使</span>便为江海客，也应忧国愿年丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1282071_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1282071'>抛梁西，万里江湖路欲迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1282071_comment'></div>家本秦人真将种，不妨卖剑买锄犁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1282071_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1282071'>抛梁南，小山排闼送晴岚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1282071_comment'></div>绕林乌鹊栖枝稳，一枕薰风睡正酣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1282071_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1282071'>抛梁北，京路尘昏断消息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1282071_comment'></div>人生直合住长沙，欲击单于老无力！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1282071_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1282071'>抛梁上，虎豹九关名莫向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1282071_comment'></div>且须天女散天花，时至维摩小方丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1282071_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1282071'>抛梁下，鸡酒何时入邻舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1282071_comment'></div>只今居士有新巢，要葺轩窗看多稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1282071_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1282071'>伏愿上梁之后，早收尘迹，自乐馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1282071_comment'></div>鬼神呵禁不祥，伏腊倍承自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1282071_comment'></div>座多佳客，日悦芳樽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1282071_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>刊行亡友周信道（孚）《蠹斋集》<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>檄衡山戴翊世行县事。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>作词和赵景明知县韵。作品：《水调歌头》（官事未易了）<div id='poem_140139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水调歌头<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>和赵景明知县韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", id='poem_sentence_0_140139'>官事未易了，且向酒边来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140139'>君如无我，问君怀抱向谁开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140139'>但放平生丘壑，莫管傍人嘲骂，深蛰要惊雷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' color: gray;'>▪</span>加右文殿修撰，差知隆兴府兼江西安抚。<br /></div>

耒阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='22703fa27a294859bbeaedf292342935_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("22703fa27a294859bbeaedf292342935");'><span id='22703fa27a294859bbeaedf292342935_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>，41岁</div><div id='22703fa27a294859bbeaedf292342935' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　耒阳道中为张处父推官赋词。作品：《阮郎归》（山前灯火欲黄昏）<div id='poem_140263' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140263' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140263?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阮郎归 耒阳道中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140263")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140263_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140263'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140263'>山前灯火欲黄昏，山头来去云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140263_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140263'>鹧鸪声里数家村，潇湘逢故人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140263_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140263'>挥羽扇，整纶巾，少年鞍马尘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140263_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140263'>如今憔悴赋招魂，儒冠多误身！</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_140263_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_140263'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(140263)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
上饶
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='75648309b22748519a6818e68d8c7ba0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("75648309b22748519a6818e68d8c7ba0");'><span id='75648309b22748519a6818e68d8c7ba0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1186')">1182-1186年</a>，43-47岁</div><div id='75648309b22748519a6818e68d8c7ba0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　解官归家，居住上饶带湖。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　有以事来请者，效康节体作诗以答之。<div id='poem_139991' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_139991' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/139991?labeling=true' target='_blank'>有以事来请者效康节体作诗以答之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_139991")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_139991_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_139991'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_139991'>未能立得自家身，何暇将身更为人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_139991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_139991'>借使有求能尽与，也知方笑已生嗔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_139991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_139991'>器才满后须招损，镜太明时易受尘。<div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140153?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水调歌头<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140153_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140153'>提干李君索余赋野秀、绿绕二诗。余诗寻医久矣，姑合二榜之意，赋水调歌头以遗之。然君才气不减流辈，岂求田问舍而独乐其身耶</div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140120'>补陀大士虚空，翠岩谁记飞来处。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140120'>蜂房万点，似穿如碍，玲珑窗户。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140120'>石髓千年，已垂未落，嶙峋冰柱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140120'>有怒涛声远，落花香在，人疑是、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_140120", 140120, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>桃源路</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140120_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140120'>又说春雷鼻息，是卧龙、弯环如许。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140120'>不然应是，洞庭张乐，湘灵来去。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140120'>我意长松，倒生阴壑，细吟风雨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140120'>竟茫茫未晓。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140120'>只应白发，是开山祖。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_140120_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　雨岩有石，状怪甚，取《离骚》《九歌》，名曰“山鬼”，因赋《摸鱼儿》，改今名。作品：《山鬼谣》（问何年此山来此）<div id='poem_140087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140087' id='poem_sentence_3_140087'>算只有、红尘不到今犹古。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140087'>一杯谁举。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140087'>须记取。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140087'>昨夜龙湫风雨。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　盘园任帅子严，挂冠得请，取执政书中语，以“高风”名其堂，来索词，为赋《水龙吟》（断崖千丈孤松）<span class='inlineComment2'>（邓广铭：周必大《跋临江军任盘园高风堂记》末署“绍熙改元二月既望”，提到任诏“后二年竟申其志”以及“郡人南安太守章君茂献尝作《高风堂记》”，可见章氏堂记必作于任氏初以“高风”名堂之时，即最迟为淳熙十五年初。稼轩词亦当作于此时，姑定为淳熙十三四年所作。）</span><div id='poem_140117' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140117' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140117?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水龙吟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_140117_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140117'>盘园任帅子严安抚挂冠得请，取执政书中语，以高风名其堂，来索词，为赋水龙吟。芗林，侍郎向公告老所居，高宗皇帝御书所赐名也，与盘园相并云</div><div id='poem_preface_140117_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140117'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140117'>断崖千丈孤松，挂冠更在松高处。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　陈亮来访，留十日，同游鹅湖，作诗题鹅湖壁。<div id='poem_139976' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_139976' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　陈亮索词，稼轩赋《贺新郎》（把酒长亭说）<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈亮和见怀韵《贺新郎》（老去凭谁说））</span><div id='poem_140385' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140385' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140385?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺新郎</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140385")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140385_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140385'>陈同父自东阳来过余，留十日，与之同游鹅湖，且会朱晦庵于紫溪，不至，飘然东归。既别之明日，余意中殊恋恋，复欲追路。至鹭鹚林，则雪深泥滑，不得前矣。独饮方村，怅然久之，颇恨挽留之不遂。夜半，投宿吴氏泉湖四望楼，闻邻笛悲甚，为赋贺新郎以见意。又五日，同父书来索词。心所同然者如此，可发千里一笑。</div><div id='poem_preface_140385_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140385'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140385'>把酒长亭说。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140385'>看渊明、风流酷似，卧龙诸葛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　范开应诏以家世赴告南宋行朝，将以求仕，辞别，稼轩以《醉翁操》相送。（长松）<span class='inlineComment2'>（词见邓广铭《稼轩词编年笺注》（定本）第271页。）</span><div id='poem_140608' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140608' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140608?labeling=true' target='_blank'>醉翁操</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140608")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140608_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140608'>顷余从廓之求观家谱，见其冠冕蝉联，世载勋德。廓之甚文而好修，意其昌未艾也。今天子即位，覃庆中外，命国朝勋臣子孙之无见仕者官之。先是，朝廷屡语甄录元祐党籍家。合是二者，廓之应仕矣。将告诸朝，行有日，请予作歌以赠。属予避谤，持此戒甚力，不得如廓之请。又念先之与予游八年，日从事诗酒间，意相得欢甚，于其别也，何独能恝然。顾廓之长于楚词，而妙于琴，辄拟醉翁操，为之词以叙别。异时廓之绾组东归，仆当买羊沽酒，廓之为鼓一再行，以为山中盛事云</div><div id='poem_preface_140608_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140608'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140608'>长松。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140468' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140468?labeling=true' target='_blank'>渔家傲</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140468_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140468'>为金伯熙寿。信之谶云：“水打乌龟石，三台出此时。”伯熙旧居城西，直龟山之北。溪水齧山足矣，意伯熙当之耶。伯熙学道有新功，一日语余云：溪上尝得异石，有文隐然，如记姓名，且有“长生”等字。余未之见也。因其生朝，姑摭二事为词以寿之</div><div id='poem_preface_140468_comment'></div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年3月3日</a>　灵山齐庵菖蒲港，皆长松茂林。独野樱花一株，山上盛开，照映可爱；不数日，风雨摧败殆尽。意有感，因效介庵体为赋，且以“菖蒲绿”，名之，作《归朝欢》（山下千林花太俗）<div id='poem_140171' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140171' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140171?labeling=true' target='_blank'>归朝欢</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年3月3日）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140171_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140171'>齐庵菖蒲港，皆长松茂林，独野梅花一株，山上盛开，照映可爱。不数日，风雨摧败殆尽。意有感，因效介庵体为赋，且以菖蒲绿名之。丙辰岁三月三日也</div><div id='poem_preface_140171_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140171'><div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140280' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140280?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沁园春<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>将止酒，戒酒杯使勿近</a><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年</a>，56岁</div><div id='412b63c7a287491fbe3ab0a228d63f45' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>期思新居落成。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>与客饮瓢泉，客以泉声喧静为问，稼轩醉，未及答，或者以“蝉噪林逾静”代对，意甚美矣，翌日为赋词以褒之。作品：《祝英台近》（水纵横）<span class='inlineComment2'>（邓广铭：该词作年难确考，当作于自闽归后者。）</span><div id='poem_140377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祝英台近<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", id='poem_sentence_0_140377'>水纵横，山远近。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140377'>拄杖占千顷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140377'>老眼羞将，水底看山影。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140377'>试教水动山摇，吾生堪笑，似此个、青山无定。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140377_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140377'>一瓢饮。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140377'>人问翁爱飞泉，来寻个中静。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140377'>绕屋声喧，怎做静中境。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140377'>我眠君且归休，维摩方丈，待天女、散花时问。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_140377_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赋《水龙吟》再题瓢泉，歌以饮客，声韵甚谐，客皆为之酹。（听兮清佩琼瑶些）<span class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140571' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140571?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蓦山溪<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>停云竹径初成</a><span href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　调寄《蓦山溪》（画堂帘卷）<span id='poem_title_140029_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_140029_0'>① 《诗渊》册五页三三一二题作题前冈周氏敬荣堂</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140029'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140029'>泰伯古至德，以逊天下闻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140029'>周公去未远，二叔乃流言。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140029'>春风棠棣萼，秋日脊令原。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140029'>岂无良友生，岁晏谁急难。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140029'>当年召公诗，虑缺兄弟恩。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140029'>贤哉首阳子，此粟久不餐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140029'>末俗益可嗟，有货无天伦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140029'>仓卒竞锱铢，或不暇掩亲。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140029'>朝从官府去，暮与妻妾论。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140029'>手植父桑柘，俄顷楚越分。<div id='poem_sentence_9_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_140029'>口泽母杯圈，改<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗渊》作正）</span>作唇齿寒。<div id='poem_sentence_10_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_140029'>我观天地间，孰不知爱身。<div id='poem_sentence_11_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_140029'>有伐其左臂，那复右者存。<div id='poem_sentence_12_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_140029'>君看百足虫，至死身不颠。<div id='poem_sentence_13_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_140029'>一矢折甚易，累十力则艰。<div id='poem_sentence_14_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_140029'>世其<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗渊》作岂）</span>有不知，利欲令智昏。<div id='poem_sentence_15_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_140029'>周君千载士，金玉<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗渊》作石）</span>四弟昆。<div id='poem_sentence_16_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_140029'>状如商山皓，雍雍古衣冠。<div id='poem_sentence_17_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_140029'>又如孔门科，行义<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗渊》作艺）</span>皆可尊。<div id='poem_sentence_18_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_140029'>我行前冈上，人指孝友门。<div id='poem_sentence_19_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_140029'>邀我饮其家，本末能具陈。<div id='poem_sentence_20_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_140029'>我家所自出，嘉祐刘三元。<div id='poem_sentence_21_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_140029'>至今起俗说，闻者薄夫醇。<div id='poem_sentence_22_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_140029'>逮我先君子，仁孝俭且文。<div id='poem_sentence_23_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_140029'>室有相乳猫，庭有同心兰。<div id='poem_sentence_24_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_140029'>推梨更逊枣，左右儿曹欢。<div id='poem_sentence_25_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_140029'>尺布与斗粟，咄哉彼何人。<div id='poem_sentence_26_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_140029'>比<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗渊》作此）</span>屋二百年，试比东西邻。<div id='poem_sentence_27_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_140029'>东家馀破釜，西里今颓垣。<div id='poem_sentence_28_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_140029'>萁豆自煎煮，拔地无本根。<div id='poem_sentence_29_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_140029'>逼逼<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗渊》作区区）</span>守遗戒，岂不在子孙。<div id='poem_sentence_30_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_140029'>矧复<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗渊》作不）</span>学圣贤，遑恤后富贫。<div id='poem_sentence_31_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_140029'>谁书百忍字，何不一笑温。<div id='poem_sentence_32_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_140029'>我老悲古道，闻此摧肺肝。<div id='poem_sentence_33_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_140029'>洗盏前致词，福善天匪悭。<div id='poem_sentence_34_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_140029'>圣朝重揖逊，欲尧舜此民。<div id='poem_sentence_35_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_140029'>请君大其门，车马行便蕃。<div id='poem_sentence_36_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_140029'>长歌谪仙李，茂记文公韩。<div id='poem_sentence_37_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_140029'>我诗聊复再<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗渊》作尔）</span>，语拙意则真。<div id='poem_sentence_38_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_140029'>此书君勿嗤，傥俟采诗官<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗渊》作人）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_39_140029_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_140029'></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_140029_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　赋诗赠申孝子世宁。<div id='poem_140055' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140055' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140055?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠申孝子世宁<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作辛弃疾诗）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1198年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35315, "宋", "马永卿", "poem_title_140055")'>马永卿</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140055_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140055'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140055'>六月烈日日正中，时有叛将号群凶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140055'>平人血染大溪浪，比屋焰照鹅湖峰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140055'>白刃纷纷蔽行路，六合茫茫何处去。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140055'>妻见夫亡不敢啼，母弃儿奔那忍顾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140055'>药市申翁鬓有霜，卧病经时不下床。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140055'>平生未省见兵革，出门正尔逢豺狼。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140055'>豺狼满市如流水，追索金缯心未已。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140055'>可怜累世积阴功，今日将为兵死鬼。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140055'>世宁孝行何高高，慨慷性命轻鸿毛。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140055'>此时自欲赴黄壤，欣然延颈迎霜刀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_140055'>至孝感兮天地动，白日无光百川涌。<div id='poem_sentence_10_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_140055'>三刀不死古今稀，一命自有神灵拥。<div id='poem_sentence_11_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_140055'>群贤激赏争作歌，要使汝名长不磨。<div id='poem_sentence_12_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_140055'>何时上书达天听，诏加<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>旌表高嵯峨。<div id='poem_sentence_13_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_140055'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_140055_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_140055'><span class='label'>按：</span>以上明笪继良《铅书》卷五<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_140055_0'>⑴ 《江西诗徵》卷一四作丰碑</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_140055_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　复集英殿修撰，主管建宁府武夷山冲佑观，赋词序曰“戊午拜复职奉祠之命”作品：《鹧鸪天》（老退何曾说着官）<div id='poem_140661' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140661' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140661?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鹧鸪天 戊午拜复职奉祠之命</a><span class='authorDate'>（1198年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140661")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140661_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140661'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140661'>老退何曾说著官。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140661'>今朝放罪上恩宽。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140661'>便支香火真侍俸，更缀文书旧殿班。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140661_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140661'>扶病脚，洗衰颜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140661'>快从老病借衣冠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140661'>此身<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_140661", 140661, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>忘世</span>浑容易，使世相忘却自难。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_140661_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　作《贺新郎》，题赵兼善龙图东山园、小鲁亭。（下马东山路）<div id='poem_140393' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140393' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140393?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺新郎<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>题赵兼善东山园小鲁亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1198年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140393")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140393_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140393'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140393'>下马东山路。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140393'>恍临风、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_140393", 140393, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>周情孔思</span>，悠然千古。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140393'>寂寞东家丘何在，缥缈危亭小鲁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140393'>试重上、岩岩高处。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140393'>更忆公归西悲日，正濛濛、陌上多零雨。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140393'>嗟费却，几章句。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140393_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140393'>谢安雅志还成趣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140393'>记风流、中年怀抱，长携歌舞。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140393'>政尔良难君臣事，晚听秦筝声苦。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140393'>快满眼、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_140393", 140393, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>松篁</span>千亩。<div id='poem_sentence_9_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_140393'>把似渠垂功名泪，算何如、且作溪山主。<div id='poem_sentence_10_140393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_140393'>双白鸟，又飞去。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_140393_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　是年吴子似为铅山尉，相遇酬唱甚多。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年</a>　作《哨遍》秋水观。（蜗角斗争）<div id='poem_140405' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140405' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140405?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哨遍<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>秋水观</a><span class='authorDate'>（1199年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140405")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140405_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140405'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140405'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_140405", 140405, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>蜗角斗争</span>，左触右蛮，一战连千里。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140405'>君试思、方寸此心微。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140405'>总虚空、并包无际。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140405'>喻此理。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140405'>何言泰山毫末，从来天地一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_140405", 140405, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>稊米</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140405'>嗟小大相形，鸠鹏自乐，之二虫又何知。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140405'>记蹠行仁义孔丘非。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140405'>更殇乐长年老彭悲。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140405'>火鼠论寒，冰蚕语热，定谁同异。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140405_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140405'>噫。<div id='poem_sentence_9_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_140405'>贵贱随时。<div id='poem_sentence_10_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_140405'>连城才换一羊皮。<div id='poem_sentence_11_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_140405'>谁与齐万物，庄周吾梦见之。<div id='poem_sentence_12_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_140405'>正商略遗篇，翩然顾笑，空堂梦觉题秋水。<div id='poem_sentence_13_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_140405'>有客问洪河，百川灌雨，泾流不辨涯涘。<div id='poem_sentence_14_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_140405'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_140405", 140405, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>于是焉</span>河伯欣然喜。<div id='poem_sentence_15_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_140405'>以天下之美尽在已。<div id='poem_sentence_16_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_140405'>渺沧溟望洋东视。<div id='poem_sentence_17_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_140405'>逡巡向若惊叹，谓我非逢子。<div id='poem_sentence_18_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_140405'>大方达观之家，未免长见，悠然笑耳。<div id='poem_sentence_19_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_140405'>此堂之水几何其。<div id='poem_sentence_20_140405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_140405'>但清溪一曲而已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_140405_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年</a>　用前韵《哨遍》（一壑自专）<div id='poem_140406' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140406' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140406'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140406'>一壑自专，五柳笑人，晚乃归田里。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140406'>嗟美恶难齐，盈虚如代，天耶何必人知。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140406'>试回头五十九年非。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140406'>似梦里欢娱觉来悲。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140406'>夔乃怜蚿，谷亦亡羊，算来何异。<div id='poem_sentence_9_140406_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_140406'>嘻。<div id='poem_sentence_10_140406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_140406'>物讳穷时。<div id='poem_sentence_11_140406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_140406'>丰狐文豹罪因皮。<div id='poem_sentence_12_140406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_140406'>看一时鱼鸟忘情喜。<div id='poem_sentence_16_140406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_140406'>会我已忘机更忘己。<div id='poem_content_140101'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140101'>晨来问疾，有鹤止庭隅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140101_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年8月23日</a>　己未八月二十日夜，梦有人以石研屏见饟者。梦中异之，为作诗数百言，大抵皆取古之怨愤变化异物等事，觉而忘其言，后三日，赋词以识其异。作品：《兰陵王》（恨之极）<div id='poem_140168' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140168' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140168?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兰陵王</a><span class='authorDate'>（1199年8月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140168")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140168_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140168'>己未八月二十日夜，梦有人以石研屏见饟者，其色如玉，光润可爱。中有一牛，磨角作斗状，云：湘潭里中有张其姓者，多力善斗，号张难敌。一日，与人搏，偶败，忿赴河而死。居三日，其家人来视之，浮水上，则牛耳。自后，并水之山，往往有此石。或得之，里中辄不利。梦中异之，为作诗数百言，大抵皆取古之怨愤变化弃物等事，觉而忘其言。后三日，赋词以识其异</div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年</a>　乐令谓卫玠：“人未尝梦捣齑餐铁杵，乘车入鼠穴。”以谓世无是事故也。稼轩谓世无是事而有是理，乐所谓无，犹云有也，戏作《玉楼春》数语以明之。（有无一理谁差别）<div id='poem_140191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140191?labeling=true' target='_blank'>玉楼春</a><span class='authorDate'>（1199年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_140191_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140191'>乐令谓卫玠：人未尝梦捣齑、餐铁杵、乘车入鼠穴，以谓世无是事故也。余谓世无是事而有是理，乐所谓无，犹之有也。戏作数语以明之</div><div id='poem_preface_140191_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140191'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140191'>有无一理谁差别。<div id='poem_140667' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140667' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140667?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鹧鸪天<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span>有客慨然谈功名，因追忆少年时事，戏作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1200年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140667")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140667_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140667'><div class='poemSentence' ShowPoemComment(140667)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年</a>　赵昌父之祖季思学士，退居郑圃，有亭名鱼计，宇文叔通为作古赋。昌父之弟成父，于所居凿池筑亭，榜以旧名，昌父为成父作诗，属稼轩赋词，为赋《哨遍》（池上主人）<div id='poem_140407' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140407' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140407?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哨遍</a><span class='authorDate'>（1200年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140407")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140407_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140407'>赵昌父之祖季思学士，退居郑圃，有亭名鱼计，宇文叔通为作古赋。今昌父之弟成父，于所居凿池筑亭，榜以旧名。昌父为成父作诗，属余赋词，余为赋哨遍。庄周论于蚁弃知，于鱼得计，于羊弃意，其义美矣。然上文论虱托于豕而得焚，羊肉为蚁所慕而致残，下文将并结二义，乃独置豕虱不言而遽论鱼，其义无所从起。又间于羊蚁两句之间，使羊蚁之义离不相属，何耶！其必有深意存焉，顾后人未之晓耳。或言蚁得水而死，羊得水而病，于得水而活，此最穿凿，不成义趣。余尝反复寻绎，终未能得。意世必有能读此书而了其义者。他日倘见之而问焉，姑先识余疑于此词云尔</div><div id='poem_preface_140407_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140407'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140407'>池上主人，人适忘鱼，鱼适还忘水。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140407'>洋洋乎、翠藻青萍里。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140407'>想鱼兮、无便于此。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140407'>尝试思，庄周正谈两事。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140407'>一明豕虱一羊蚁。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140407'>说蚁慕于膻，于蚁弃知，又说于羊弃意。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140407'>甚虱焚于豕独忘之。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140407'>却骤说于鱼为得计。<div id='poem_sentence_7_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_140407'>千古遗文，我不知言，以我非子。<div id='poem_sentence_8_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_140407'>噫，<br />子固非鱼，鱼之为计子焉知。<div id='poem_sentence_9_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_140407'>河水深且广，风涛万顷堪依。<div id='poem_sentence_10_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_140407'>有网罟如云，鹈鹕成阵，过而留泣计应非。<div id='poem_sentence_11_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_140407'>其外海茫茫，下有龙伯，饥时一啖千里。<div id='poem_sentence_12_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_140407'>更<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_140407", 140407, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>任公</span>五十犗为饵。<div id='poem_sentence_13_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_140407'>使海上人人厌腥味。<div id='poem_sentence_14_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_140407'>似鹍鹏、变化能几。<div id='poem_sentence_15_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_140407'>东游入海，此计直以命为嬉。<div id='poem_sentence_16_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_140407'>古来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_140407", 140407, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>谬算</span>狂图，五鼎烹死，指为平地。<div id='poem_sentence_17_140407_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年</a>　开山径得石壁，因名曰苍壁。事出望外，意天之所赐邪，喜而赋词。作品：《千年调》（左手把青霓）<div id='poem_140081' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140081' class='poemTitle </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140081")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140081_comment'></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年</a>　苍壁初开，传闻过实，客有来观者，意其如积翠、清风、岩石、玲珑之胜，既见之，乃独为是突兀而止也，大笑而去。主人戏下一转语，为苍壁解嘲，作《临江仙》（莫笑吾家苍壁小）<div id='poem_140332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>临江仙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1201年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140332")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140332_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140332'>苍壁初开，传闻过实。客有来观者，意其如积翠清风岩石玲珑之胜。既见之，乃独为是突兀而止也，大笑而去。主人戏下一转语，为苍壁解嘲</div><div id='poem_preface_140332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140332'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140332'>莫笑吾家苍壁小，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_140332", 140332, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>棱层</span>势欲摩空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140332_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1202&endYear=1202')">1202年</a>　严和之好古博雅，以严本庄姓，取蒙庄、子陵四事：曰濮上、曰濠梁、曰齐泽、曰严濑，为四图，属稼轩赋词。稼轩作《乳燕飞》词使歌之。作品：《贺新郎》（濮上看垂钓）<div id='poem_140381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140381?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺新郎</a><span class='authorDate'>（1202年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140381")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140381_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_140381'>严和之好古博雅，以严本庄姓，取蒙庄、子陵四事：曰濮上、曰濠梁、曰齐泽、曰严濑，为四图，属予赋词。予谓蜀君平之高，扬子云所谓虽隋和何以加诸者，班孟坚独取子云所称述为王贡诸传序引，不敢以其姓名列诸传，尊之也。故予谓和之当并图君平像，置之四图之间，庶几严氏之高节者备焉。作乳燕飞词使歌之</div><div id='poem_preface_140381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140381'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140381'>濮上看垂钓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140381'>更风流、羊裘泽畔，精神<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_140381", 140381, -----title
崇安街道（崇安）
-----detail

-----title
福州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='f8c9f48fb3e34540941dd2f7fab8a8d9_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f8c9f48fb3e34540941dd2f7fab8a8d9");'><span id='f8c9f48fb3e34540941dd2f7fab8a8d9_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>，53岁</div><div id='f8c9f48fb3e34540941dd2f7fab8a8d9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　汀州有疑狱，稼轩委任上杭令鲍粹然断决。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　折狱定刑，务从宽厚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　林枅任福建安抚使，稼轩与之不协。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年9月</a>　秋九月，林枅卒，稼轩摄帅事，厉威严，以法治下。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　上疏论经界盐钞事。作品：论经界钞盐札子。<div id='poem_1282061' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1282061' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1282061?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论经界钞盐劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_1282061")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1282061_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1282061'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1282061'>天下之事，因民所欲行之，则易为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1282061_comment'></div>漳、泉、汀三州皆未经界，漳、泉民颇不乐行，独汀之民，力无高下，家无贫富，常有请也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1282061_comment'></div>且其言曰：「苟经界之行，其间条目，官府所虑谓将害民者，官不必虑也，吾民自任之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1282061_comment'></div>其言切矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1282061_comment'></div>故曰经界为上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1282061_comment'></div>其次莫若行钞盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1282061_comment'></div>钞盐利害，前帅臣赵汝愚论奏甚详，臣不复重陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1282061_comment'></div>独议者以向来漕臣陈岘固尝建议施行，寻即废罢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1282061_comment'></div>朝廷又询徵广西更改盐法之弊，重于开陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1282061_comment'></div>其实不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1282061_comment'></div>广西变法，无人买钞，因缘欺罔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1282061_comment'></div>福建钞法，才四阅月，客人买钞，几登递年所卖全额之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1282061_comment'></div>止缘变法之初，四州客钞辄令通行，而汀州最远，汀民未及搬贩，而三州之贩盐已番钞入汀，侵夺其额，汀钞发泄，以致少缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1282061_comment'></div>官吏取以藉口，破坏其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1282061_comment'></div>今日之议，正欲行之汀之一州，奈何因噎而废食耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1282061_comment'></div>故曰钞盐次之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1282061_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　是年以女妻陈汝玉。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　与朱熹游从甚繁，情谊甚款。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　怀安县尉杨岳目疾，稼轩呼医治疗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　作《临江仙》和信守王道夫韵，谢其为寿，时稼轩作闽宪。（记取年年为寿客）<div id='poem_140345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_140345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140345'>莫教弦管便生衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　友人陈亮卒，年五十二，稼轩有祭文。作品：祭陈同父文。<div id='poem_1282069' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1282069' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1282069?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭陈同父文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_1282069")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1282069_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1282069'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1282069'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1282069_comment'></div>同父之才，落笔千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1282069_comment'></div>俊丽雄伟，珠明玉坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1282069_comment'></div>人方窘步，我则沛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1282069_comment'></div>庄周、李白，庸敢先鞭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1282069_comment'></div>同父之志，平盖万夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1282069_comment'></div>横渠少日，慷慨是须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1282069_comment'></div>拟将十万，登封狼胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1282069_comment'></div>彼臧、马辈，殆其庸奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1282069_comment'></div>天于同父，既丰厥禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1282069_comment'></div>智略横生，议论风凛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1282069_comment'></div>使之早遇，岂愧衡伊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1282069_comment'></div>行年五十，犹一布衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1282069_comment'></div>閒以才豪，跌宕四出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1282069_comment'></div>要其所厌，千人一律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1282069_comment'></div>不然少贬，动顾规检，夫人能之，同父非短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1282069_comment'></div>至今海内，能诵三书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1282069_comment'></div>世无杨意，孰主相如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1282069_comment'></div>中更险困，如履冰崖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1282069_comment'></div>人皆欲杀，我独怜才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1282069_comment'></div>脱廷尉系，先多士鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1282069_comment'></div>耿耿未阻，厥声浸宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1282069_comment'></div>盖至是而世未知同父者，益信其为天下之伟人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1282069_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1282069_comment'></div>人才之难，自古而然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1282069_comment'></div>匪难其人，抑难其天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1282069_comment'></div>使乖崖公而不遇，安得征吴入蜀之休绩？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1282069_comment'></div>太原决胜，即异时落魄之齐贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1282069_comment'></div>方同父之约处，孰不望夫上之人，谓握瑜而不宣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1282069_comment'></div>今同父发策大廷，天子亲寘之第一，是不忧其不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1282069_comment'></div>以同父之才与志，天下之事孰不可为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1282069_comment'></div>所不能自为者，天靳之年！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1282069_comment'></div>闽浙相望，信问未绝，子胡一病，遽与我诀！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1282069_comment'></div>呜呼同父，而止是耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1282069_comment'></div>而今而后，欲与同父憩鹅湖之清阴，酌瓢泉而共饮，长歌相答，极论世事，可复得耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1282069_comment'></div>千里寓辞，知悲之无益，而涕不能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1282069_comment'></div>呜呼同父，尚或临监之否？</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1282069_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: 建瓯（建安）
