"Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>望中</span>犹记，烽火扬州路。<div id='poem_sentence_5_140178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_140178'>可堪回首，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_140178", 140178, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>佛狸祠</span>下，一片<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_140178", 140178, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>神鸦</span>社鼓。<div id='poem_sentence_6_140178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_140178'>凭谁问：廉颇老矣，尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_140178", 140178, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>能饭</span>否？</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_140178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_140178'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(140178)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年6月</a>　夏六月，改知隆兴府，旋以言者论列，与宫观。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　林克斋闻稼轩移镇隆兴之命，有函致贺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　秋，归铅山，有词。作品：《玉楼春》（江头一带斜阳树）<div id='poem_140186' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140186' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140186?labeling=true' target='_blank'>玉楼春<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>乙丑京口奉祠西归，将至仙人矶</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140186")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140186_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140186'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140186'>江头一带斜阳树。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140186'>总是六朝人住处。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140186'>悠悠兴废不关心，惟有沙洲双白鹭。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140186_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140186'>仙人矶下多风雨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140186'>好卸征帆留不住。<div id='poem_sentence_4_140186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_140186'>直须抖擞尽尘埃，却趁新凉秋水去。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_140186_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
余干
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='5a6e40f256f94611afe149117c2ea93c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5a6e40f256f94611afe149117c2ea93c");'><span id='5a6e40f256f94611afe149117c2ea93c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>，66岁</div><div id='5a6e40f256f94611afe149117c2ea93c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　乙丑奉祠归，舟次余干，赋词。作品：《瑞鹧鸪》（江头日日打头风）<div id='poem_140569' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_140569' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/140569?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瑞鹧鸪<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span>乙丑奉祠归舟次馀干赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_140569")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_140569_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_140569'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_140569'>江头日日打头风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_140569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_140569'>憔悴归来邴曼容。<div id='poem_sentence_1_140569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_140569'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_140569", 140569, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>郑贾</span>正应求死鼠，叶公岂是好真龙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_140569_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_140569'>孰居无事陪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_140569", 140569, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>犀首</span>，未办求封遇万松。<div id='poem_sentence_3_140569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_140569'>却笑千年曹孟德，梦中相对也龙钟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_140569_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
江山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='5acfaf0349c549d1aae3424127d586ef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5acfaf0349c549d1aae3424127d586ef");'><span id='5acfaf0349c549d1aae3424127d586ef_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年</a>，68岁</div><div id='5acfaf0349c549d1aae3424127d586ef' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径江郎山赋诗。作品：江郎山和韵。<div id='poem_139930' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_139930' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/139930?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江郎山和韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_139930")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_139930_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_139930'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_139930'>三峰一一青如削，卓立千寻不可干。<div id='poem_sentence_0_139930_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_139930'>正直相扶无倚傍，撑持天地与人看<span class='inlineComment2'>（清同治《江山县志》卷一）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_139930_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_139930'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_139930_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>赋诗二首庆云桥。作品：庆云桥诗二首。<div id='poem_139929' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_139929' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/139929?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江山庆云桥<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(32928, "南宋", "辛弃疾", "poem_title_139929")'>辛弃疾</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_139929_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_139929_0'>① 题原作江山，据清同治《江山县志》卷一补</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_139929'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_139929'>草梢出水已无多，村路㳽漫奈雨何。<div id='poem_sentence_0_139929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_139929'>水底有桥桥有月，只今平地怕风波。<div id='poem_sentence_1_139929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_139929'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_139929_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_139928' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_139928' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/139928?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_139928_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_139928'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_139928'>断崖老树互撑拄，白水绿畦相灌输。<div id='poem_sentence_0_139928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_139928'>焉得溪南一丘壑，放船画作归来图。<div id='poem_sentence_1_139928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_139928'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_139928_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end
